column1: The family will receive friends beginning at 5:00pm on Friday from the funeral home.  Funeral services will be conducted 4:00pm Saturday
column3: 2015 from the Chapel of Low Country Cremation Services and Burial with E.M. Jose Orenos officiating.  Interment will follow in the Glennville Memorial Gardens.  Low Country Cremation Services and Burial is serving the Reyes family.
